item.title: üé§ MF FOOM: AI-generated MF DOOM songs
item.description: I fine-tuned GPT-3 on the lyrics of 96 MF DOOM songs to write lyrics in his style. Then, i cloned his voice to a text-to-voice model to make him rap them.

item.title: ‚öñÔ∏è local regulation of artificial intelligence in the US
item.description: An overview of the issues about the progress of artificial intelligence that are relevant to local regulators.

item.title: üîê the 2/3 rule for multi-factor authentication
item.description: I propose the "2/3 rule" for multi-factor authentication: to access a system, a user must pass at least two out of three possible methods for authentication. Unlike standard 2-factor authentication, this strategy protects against both false positives (granting access to a hacker) and false negatives (denying access to a legitimate user).

item.title: üîç tools for finding information on the internet
item.description: Links to websites that help you navigate the cyberspace and overcome obstacles to truth.
